item.title: Not All Lies Are Meant To Fool
item.description: What line of work was Tony Soprano in? Waste management. Did Tony Soprano expect people to believe he was in waste management? No. Tony Soprano expected people realize he was a wise guy and treat him with due respect–or what you and I call fear. Some lies are meant to make the liar seem more successful or more talented or better than he thinks he is. Trust me, I’ve done it.
